import React, {useEffect, useRef, useState} from 'react' import Topbar from '../Topbar/Topbar' import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import './VacanciesView.css' import axios from "axios"; function VacanciesView() { const [deps, setDeps] = useState([]) const department = useRef() useEffect(() => { const getDeps = async () => { const res = await axios.get('/api/departments/') setDeps(res.data) } getDeps() }, []) const button = async () => { const res = await axios.get('/api/user/') console.log('res=',res.data) } return ( <>
